definition: An extensive group of states or countries under a single supreme authority, formerly especially an emperor or empress.
An aircraft designed to carry and drop bombs.
The action of excavating something, especially an archaeological site.
A person not in the armed services or the police force.
A religious or solemn ceremony consisting of a series of actions performed according to a prescribed order.
Remove or obliterate, especially by drawing a line through it or marking it with a delete sign.
Connected with God (or the gods) or dedicated to a religious purpose and so deserving veneration.
Settling an issue; producing a definite result
Pursue in order to catch or catch up with.
Use a computer to gain unauthroized access to data in a system.
